entry.title: Zelensky Urges Russians to Keep Protesting Mobilization Orders
entry.content: Kyiv reiterated calls for Russian men summoned to fight in Ukraine to lay down their arms as soon as they arrive in the country, as protests against mobilization continued in Russia.

entry.title: Russian Recruitment Centers Attacked Amid Mobilization Pushback
entry.content: Tensions grew in Russia over mobilization for the war in Ukraine as two military-recruitment centers came under attack and lines developed at the border with draft-age men seeking to leave the country.

entry.title: China Reins In Its Belt and Road Program, $1 Trillion Later
entry.content: After tens of billions of dollars in loans have gone sour and many infrastructure development projects have stalled, Beijing is revamping its troubled initiative.
